entry.title: Combined summary - Minsc, a Miniscript-based scripting language
entry.summary: Minsc is a high-level scripting language that allows users to express Bitcoin Script spending conditions with a user-friendly syntax. It is based on the Miniscript Policy language and comes equipped with additional features such as variables, functions, infix notation, and human-readable times. The website provides a live compiler and documentation, while the source code is available on Github. Users can explore Minsc's capabilities through example scripts found on the website, which include traditional preimage-based HTLC, Liquid-like federated pegin with emergency recovery keys, and 2FA setups. The web code editor UI allows for experimenting with bare policies with real-time compilation and error reporting. Feedback is welcomed by its developer, Nadav.
